Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: I’ve been coming here since I just moved to Amsterdam 2,5 years ago. Until today, Thai Deum is still my favourite Thai restaurant in Amsterdam: delicious food for very reasonable prices. Their green curry is unbeatable. I’ll keep on being a loyal customer. See you soon!

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: We have been eating/ ordering here for the last  11 years. Consistently good authentic food and excellent service. It’s a family run business, with various members all doing their bit behind the open kitchen, but making sure to stop to …

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: I've had dinner here and ordered takeaway numerous times. The food is tasty and reasonably priced with more authentic flavors than what you often encounter in Amsterdam. The interior is a bit old but charming and the atmosphere very …

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: Horrible. Portions are a joke for the expensive price you put and the food is no good. Worst part is, when you give feedback the chef gets angry and screams at you. Such a terrible place, should be shut down!

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: My pregnant wife and I were sat in the park when we discussed the idea of getting some thai cuisine. I had passed this restaurant on my bicycle on several occasions and so we decided to go there. …

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: I've come here 3 separate times on 3 separate trips. Every time fantastic.

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: I order Laab Kai and Tom Yak Plaa for takeaway. The people in the restaurant were extremely friendly, typical Thai. …

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: This has been our favorite Thai in Holland for about a decade now. The one dish you have to try - as we've found it to be one of the best ever - is Pad Thai: thin noodles, own recipe for fish sauce, spicy yet super flavorful, not oily but …

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: The staff has limited English, but very hospitable. Coconut curry dishes were absolutely amazing! The Exotic Thai decor is very tasteful. Excellent value for money. …

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: My favorite Thai in Amsterdam! Delicious food and very kind and fast service. Great range of options, varying from chicken with ginger and mushrooms to deer or wild boar to vegetarian dishes. All served with a genuine Thai smile!

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: Delicious food, with quick and friendly service. A wide and varied menu with plenty of vegetarian options. The decor and ambiance were wonderful as well. The kitchen is open so you can watch the cooks from your table if you would like. We will definitely be coming back.

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: Stopped by Saturday at around 8:30pm and it was not very busy. The food was delicious. One of the better pad thais that I've had! We also ordered #162 (don't remember the name, but it is beef with onions, mushrooms, and chilis) and I liked that too. We decided to make this our Go To Thai place.

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: Good authentic Thai food. We had the tom yam goong and pork green curry, which were nice. The restaurant is a little understaffed though. Takes a bit of time to put your order.

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: Great homemade Thai food (without MSG!), very kind personnel and great atmosphere.

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: Not the best tasting aperitives (fishcakes and prawns) but spring rolls and chicken OK. Duck was ok-ish and pad thai was good. Overall a bit lacking relative to price. Service was nice and friendly and the place cosy.

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: I lived in Thailand for four years and this is the only place I can justify spending western prices on Thai dishes. I think the food is delicious and authentic. An absolute gem in my mind.

Name: Thai Deum
Review Text: A Chef with a clear passion for Thai food. I love her cooking!

Review Text: Best authentic Thai cuisine

Review Text: Super lekker. But they don't accept credit cards. The food was really good though for the price.
